title: Mekong Crossing
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Cambodian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Informal, relaxed bar and restaurant serving vegetarian versions of traditional Cambodian dishes using tofu instead of meat, as well as western comfort foods such as tofu burger, fries, and chocolate cake. Riverfront location and comfortable chairs.
